DOC.brief_summary: Atosiban , administer embryo transfer , improve implantation rate clinical pregnancy rate patient repeat implantation failure undergo IVF-ET ( in-vitro fertilization embryo transfer ) .
DOC.brief_title: Atosiban Improves Implantation Pregnancy Rates Patients With Repeated Implantation Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Atosiban mixed oxytocin vasopressin V1A receptor antagonist.Combined antagonism oxytocin vasopressin V1A receptor reduce uterine contraction correspond decrease intrauterine production prostaglandin F2alpha improve uterine blood supply . These effect potential benefit implantation support IVF-ET cycle .
DOC.criteria: repeat implantation failure least 1 good quality embryo transfer uterine abnormality could compromise implantation process ( e.g . fibroid , endometrial polyp , bicornuate uterus , adhesion uterine cavity )
